name: com.mytoolz.mvploadingscreen
description: Plug-and-use loading screen solution with async scene management and MVP architecture. Requires Zenject (https://github.com/modesttree/Zenject), UniTask (https://github.com/Cysharp/UniTask), SerializeReferenceExtensions (https://github.com/mackysoft/Unity-SerializeReferenceExtensions)
